mapper.select: select t1.goods_id goodsId, t1.supplier_id supplierId, t1.standard standard, t1.standard_value standardValue, t1.min_order_quantity minOrderQuantity, t1.cost_price costPrice, t1.sgiid sgiid, t1.del_flag delFlag, t2.sgi_name sgiName, t2.sgi_img sgiImg from t_supplier_goods t1 INNER JOIN t_store_goods_info t2 on t1.sgiid = t2.sgiid WHERE t1.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT DISTINCT t4.sgmfid, t4.sgmf_name sgmfName, t4.sgmf_sort sgmfSort, t4.sgmf_type sgmfType, t4.create_date createDate, t4.create_by createBy, t4.update_date updateDate, t4.update_by updateBy, t4.valid_flag validFlag, t4.sgmf_icon sgmfIcon, t4.is_redpaper_usable isRedpaperUsable FROM t_supplier_goods t1 INNER JOIN t_store_goods_info t2 ON t1.sgiid = t2.sgiid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_second t3 on t2.sgmsid = t3.sgmsid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_first t4 on t3.sgmfid = t4.sgmfid WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.sgmsid, t3.sgms_name sgmsName, t3.sgms_sort sgmsSort, t3.sgmfid sgmfid, t3.create_date createDate, t3.create_by createBy, t3.update_by updateBy, t3.valid_flag validFlag FROM t_supplier_goods t1 INNER JOIN t_store_goods_info t2 ON t1.sgiid = t2.sgiid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_second t3 on t2.sgmsid = t3.sgmsid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_first t4 on t3.sgmfid = t4.sgmfid AND t4.sgmfid = #{firstMenuId} WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT DISTINCT t4.sgmfid firstMenuId, t4.sgmf_name firstMenuName, t3.sgmsid secondMenuId, t3.sgms_name secondMenuName FROM t_supplier_goods t1 INNER JOIN t_store_goods_info t2 ON t1.sgiid = t2.sgiid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_second t3 ON t2.sgmsid = t3.sgmsid INNER JOIN t_store_goods_menu_first t4 ON t3.sgmfid = t4.sgmfid WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.supplier_id = #{supplierId}
